author: James Morley III
title: Ben Carson to Newsmax: Intel Letter 'Messed With the System' | Newsmax.com
text: By James Morley III | Thursday, 27 June 2024 05:28 PM EDT Dr. Ben Carson told Newsmax on Thursday that "there is clear evidence they messed with the system in a very major way" after Rep. Jim Jordan, R-Ohio, released transcripts of several former intelligence officials who signed the 2020 open letter saying Hunter Biden's laptop had "all the earmarks of a Russian information operation." Now, almost four years later, the FBI admitted in court that the laptop and its contents were authentic. The former presidential candidate and former Trump administration Cabinet member said it's "a difficult situation" and hard for him to wrap his head around. "When you go back and look at that letter that was sent with 51 intelligence agency heads signing it, the Russia collusion stories ‚Äî are they messing with the system?" he asked during an appearance on "The Chris Salcedo Show." Carson noted that the attempts to dismiss the laptop as Russian disinformation "probably did have an impact" on the 2020 election. "In fact, there was a survey done about the laptop, and 6% of voters said they would have changed their vote ‚Äî 6% would have made a difference," he said. "And the real question is, Are we going to do anything about it?" About NEWSMAX TV: NEWSMAX is the fastest-growing cable news channel in America! ¬© 2024 Newsmax. All rights reserved. Receive breaking news and original analysis - sent right to your inbox. Interest-Based Advertising | Do not sell or share my personal information Newsmax, Moneynews, Newsmax Health, and Independent. author: Redacci√≥n El Universal
title: Mar√≠a Teresa Jim√©nez impulsa innovaci√≥n tecnol√≥gica; inaugura laboratorio para pruebas de semiconductores | El Universal
text:
Aguascalientes, Aguascalientes.- La gobernadora Mar√≠a Teresa Jim√©nez Esquivel puso en marcha el laboratorio con la m√°s alta tecnolog√≠a para el dise√±o de pruebas de semiconductores para ser utilizados a nivel mundial. En este laboratorio de ingenier√≠a de √∫ltima generaci√≥n se invirtieron 200 millones de pesos y contribuir√° al desarrollo econ√≥mico, inform√≥ y agradeci√≥ por confiar en Aguascalientes para llevar a cabo sus proyectos de expansi√≥n.
La empresa estadounidense Semtech instal√≥ este laboratorio que se dedicar√° al dise√±o de pruebas para semiconductores que se aplicar√°n en varias partes del mundo.
‚ÄúGracias por contribuir al desarrollo econ√≥mico de nuestro estado y por seguir confiando en Aguascalientes para llevar a cabo sus proyectos de expansi√≥n‚Äù, asegur√≥ la gobernadora.
Y reiter√≥ que ‚Äútengan por seguro que el Gobierno del Estado trabaja a diario para generar las condiciones que ustedes requieren para seguir creciendo‚Äù.
En el evento inaugural, Jorge Varona Salazar, vicepresidente de Ingenier√≠a y director de Semtech M√©xico, detall√≥ que esta compa√±√≠a es un proveedor global de alta tecnolog√≠a de circuitos integrados semiconductores y sistemas relacionados con el Internet de las Cosas (IoT) y la Inteligencia Artificial (AI).
Dijoque tienen presencia en Estados Unidos, Canad√° Inglaterra, Francia, Suiza, India, China y Jap√≥n, entre otros pa√≠ses.
Tambi√©n destac√≥ que en Aguascalientes cuentan con un centro de dise√±o que hoy se fortalece con la creaci√≥n de estas nuevas instalaciones, al agregar capacidades avanzadas de ingenier√≠a para el ensamble, prueba y empaquetado de microchips.
Asistieron a este evento el titular de la Secretar√≠a de Desarrollo Econ√≥mico, Ciencia y Tecnolog√≠a del Estado (Sedecyt), Esa√∫ Garza de Vega; Jorge Armando Andrade Seraf√≠n, subsecretario de Inversi√≥n y Desarrollo de la Sedecyt.
Y Francisco Rangel C√°ceres, director de Educaci√≥n Superior del Instituto de Educaci√≥n de Aguascalientes; Jorge Armando Llamas Esparza, Jefe del Departamento de Energ√≠as de la Sedecyt; adem√°s de directivos y personal de Semtech.

author: Ken Iikura-Gross
title: MLB Tokyo Series Plays Up Shohei Ohtani's Mega Pok√©mon Connection - Interest - Anime News Network
text:
Image via x.com Photo: ¬©ÈùíÂë≥Âôå Los Angeles Dogers: ¬©MLB Pok√©mon: ¬©2025 Pok√©mon. ¬©1995-2025 Nintendo/Creatures Inc. /GAME FREAK inc. You might have missed it in the global telecast, but attendees at the Major League Baseball (MLB) Tokyo Series opener between the Los Angeles Dodgers and Chicago Cubs saw players introduced with accompanying visuals of Mega Pok√© mon. For example, the Dodgers' Shohei Ohtani and Tommy Edman were introduced as Mega Garchomp (Gaburias in Japanese) and Mega Sharpedo (Samehader), respectively. Similarly, Cubs right fielder Kyle Tucker was Mega Houndoom (Hellgar).

The player introduction ceremony also featured a child in a baseball uniform holding a Pok√©ball on the pitcher's mound. MLB posted the full Pok√©mon -themed player introduction ceremony, Pikachu mascots and all:
Fans of Pok√©mon and baseball have noted the similarities between Garchomp and Ohtani's stats for years. X (formerly Twitter ) user @5CRubmZm9w971 posted an image of a pair of Ohtani and Garchomp pop-up stands at a store last year. As the stands' captions half-jokingly note, the two are nearly identical in height, weight, two-way playing style, and unstoppability once they appear.

While Pok√©mon took center stage during the Tokyo Series, Japanese musicians YOSHIKI and Little Glee Monster also appeared at the games to perform the American and Japanese national anthems. The MLB posted videos just after their performances. YOSHIKI has performed the national anthem for several Dodgers games in the past.

author: Julian Mann
title: The true Saviour of the whole world - The Conservative Woman
text:
THE Prayer Book reading for today, Good Friday, from John‚Äôs Gospel reveals the profound irony in Pontius Pilate‚Äôs refusal to change the inscription on Jesus‚Äôs cross from a declaration of objective truth to a subjective claim.
All four New Testament Gospels record the inscription on the cross but John‚Äôs is the only one to relate the controversy over it:
‚Äò And Pilate wrote a title, and put it on the cross. And the writing was Jesus Of Nazareth The King Of The Jews. This title [was] then read [by] many of the Jews: for the place where Jesus was crucified was nigh to the city: and it was written in Hebrew, and Greek, and Latin. Then said the chief priests of the Jews to Pilate, Write not, The King of the Jews; but that he said, I am King of the Jews.Pilate answered, What I have written I have written‚Äô (John 19v19-22 ‚Äì King James Version).
The Apostle John, in his witness account of the life, death and resurrection of Jesus Christ, previously recorded how the Roman Governor, against his better judgment, gave in to the demands of the crowd to have Jesus condemned to death. He knew Jesus was innocent of the charges of political insurrection the religious leaders in Jerusalem had levelled against him.
Jesus had no political agenda. He made clear to Pilate during their conversation in the Praetorium: ‚ÄòMy kingdom is not of this world: if my kingdom were of this world, then would my servants fight, that I should not be delivered to the Jews: but now is my kingdom not from hence‚Äô (John 18v36).
Pilate seemed to grasp that the kingdom of which Jesus spoke was spiritual: ‚ÄòPilate therefore said unto him, Art thou a king then? Jesus answered, Thou sayest that I am a king. To this end was I born, and for this cause came I into the world, that I should bear witness unto the truth. Every one that is of the truth heareth my voice. Pilate saith unto him, What is truth?
‚ÄòAnd when he had said this, he went out again unto the Jews, and saith unto them, I find in him no fault at all. But ye have a custom, that I should release unto you one at the passover: will ye therefore that I release unto you the King of the Jews? Then cried they all again, saying, Not this man, but Barabbas. Now Barabbas was a robber‚Äô (John 18v37-40).
Barabbas won the ‚ÄòI‚Äôm a criminal, get me out of here‚Äô popularity contest and Pilate gave in to the mob incited by the religious leaders outside the Praetorium. Yet with the obstinacy of a weak man he refused to change the inscription on Jesus‚Äôs cross.
John‚Äôs Gospel is revealing a vital truth through the irony of Pilate‚Äôs behaviour. Pilate was a man who was very uncertain about truth. ‚ÄòWhat is truth?‚Äô he famously said to Jesus when the Lord said to him: ‚ÄòEvery one that is of the truth heareth my voice.‚Äô
Like many people in the 1 st Century Roman Empire and the agnostic majority in the 21 st Century West, Pilate was deeply uncertain about whether there are universal, God-given principles to rule human beliefs and actions. Pilate‚Äôs uncertainty led him to give in to the mob‚Äôs demand to crucify the Truth in Person.
But here he was sticking with what he wrote, which happened to be universal, objective truth, the reality that Jesus came into the world as the King of the Jews, the Messiah of Old Testament promise and expectation. The universal, objective truth which the Bible proclaims is that the one true God sent his Messiah, his Christ, his anointed King, to save his chosen people, the Jews, and not only to save them but people from any and every nation who bow the knee to the King of the Jews. Pilate could have been included, but for his proud agnosticism.
There is another level of irony in Pilate‚Äôs refusal to change his inscription. If the religious leaders had had their way, there would have been a past tense over Jesus: ‚ÄòBut that he said . . .‚Äô No past tense points to the fact that on the day after the Sabbath death was going to lose its grip on the King of the Jews.
The crucified and risen Jesus invites all of humanity to believe the truth about him as the Jewish Messiah who died to save us from our sins. We need saving from our sins and the devastating consequences of them. Absorbing in himself the divine judgment our sins deserve, Jesus showed himself to be the true Saviour of the whole world because he died on the cross as ‚ÄòJesus Of Nazareth The King Of The Jews‚Äô.
This Good Friday Collect, one of three in the Prayer Book, is a beautiful prayer for all Christian people: ‚ÄòAlmighty God, we beseech thee graciously to behold this thy family, for which our Lord Jesus Christ was contented to be betrayed, and given up into the hands of wicked men, and to suffer death upon the cross, who now liveth and reigneth with thee and the Holy Ghost, ever one God, world without end.‚Äô

author: Estela Benetti
title: Santa Catarina abre 101,1 mil empregos formais em 2023, at√© novembro - NSC Total
text:
Conhecida como ‚Äúterra do emprego‚Äù, Santa Catarina manteve a quinta posi√ß√£o entre os estados mais geradores de vagas formais de trabalho de janeiro a novembro de 2023. Foram abertos nesse per√≠odo 101.062 vagas e o Estado ficou atr√°s apenas de S√£o Paulo, Minas Gerais, Rio de Janeiro e Paran√°, mostra o Cadastro Geral de Empregados e Desempregados (Caged) do Minist√©rio do Trabalho. No m√™s de novembro, SC teve saldo positivo de 6.672 vagas.
Continua depois da publicidade
Siga as not√≠cias do NSC Total pelo Google Not√≠cias
No per√≠odo de janeiro a novembro, a lideran√ßa na cria√ß√£o de vagas em SC ficou com o setor de servi√ßos, que somou 57.374. Foi seguido pela ind√∫stria com 16.486, o com√©rcio com 12.924, a constru√ß√£o civil com 11.245, e o agroneg√≥cio com 3.033. A soma da ind√∫stria com a constru√ß√£o civil, que tamb√©m √© ind√∫stria, totalizou 27.731 novas vagas.
Em todo o pa√≠s, em novembro, foram criadas 130.097 novas vagas. Na contagem dos 11 meses entre janeiro e novembro, o Brasil gerou 1,9 milh√£o de novos empregos formais. Nos mesmos meses de 2022, foram quase 2,5 milh√µes de novas vagas.
Em SC, no m√™s de novembro, os dados mostram a din√¢mica setorial na economia. Os servi√ßos lideraram com 4.823 novas vagas, com destaque para os setores de informa√ß√£o, comunica√ß√£o, atividades imobili√°rias e financeiras, hot√©is, restaurantes, armazenagem e correios.
Continua depois da publicidade
O com√©rcio, que refor√ßou atendimento para vendas de Natal, contratou 4.404 pessoas, e o agroneg√≥cio, em fases de plantio e colheita, contratou 1.717 trabalhadores. A ind√∫stria, que produziu mais em setembro e outubro, fechou 2.669 vagas em novembro, e a constru√ß√£o civil, reduziu 1.603 vagas.
Munic√≠pios que mais abriram vagas
Florian√≥polis, embalada pelo com√©rcio e o turismo de ver√£o, liderou as contrata√ß√µes com 1.580 novas vagas em novembro. Em segundo lugar ficou Joinville com 853, e Ituporanga ficou em terceiro com 771 contrata√ß√µes, em fun√ß√£o da colheita da cebola.
Tamb√©m tiveram desempenhos destacados na cria√ß√£o de vagas os munic√≠pios de S√£o Jos√© com 570, seguido por Itaja√≠ (448), Balne√°rio Cambori√∫ (432), Palho√ßa (325), S√£o Joaquim (262), Garopaba (196), Bombinhas (188), Mafra (186), Fraiburgo (162), S√£o Francisco do Sul (151), Imbuia (147), Penha (145), Jaguaruna (140), I√ßara (138), Capinzal (126), Crici√∫ma (121), Araquari (116) e Itapo√° (109).
Leia tamb√©m Exporta√ß√µes de SC crescem 5% em novembro e faturamento ultrapassa US$ 920 milh√µes
Fazenda de SC prefere avaliar antes de fazer nova exce√ß√£o na aduana de Dion√≠sio Cerqueira

author: Irene Tabera
title: Garc√≠a Ortiz purg√≥ al fiscal que acus√≥ a los CDR de terrorismo porque rechazaba pedir la amnist√≠a
text:
Garc√≠a Ortiz purg√≥ al fiscal que acus√≥ a los CDR de terrorismo porque rechazaba pedir la amnist√≠a
El fiscal del caso no ha acudido a la Audiencia Nacional y fuentes solventes se√±alan que est√° "avergonzado"
Vicente Gonz√°lez Mota, el fiscal del caso de los 12 CDR a los que acus√≥ de terrorismo y para los que pidi√≥ 248 a√±os de c√°rcel, no estaba dispuesto a solicitar ahora su amnist√≠a. De ah√≠ que este jueves fuera apartado de
la vista en la que la Fiscal√≠a solicit√≥ la amnist√≠a para todos ellos. Su lugar lo ocup√≥ Marta Dur√°ntez, que fue nombrada teniente fiscal de la Audiencia Nacional por el fiscal general del Estado, √Ålvaro Garc√≠a Ortiz, en octubre de 2022. Fuentes consultadas se√±alan que Gonz√°lez Mota estaba ¬´furioso y Yeavergonzado¬ª por tener que seguir √≥rdenes y pedir la amnist√≠a para delitos que llevaba a√±os investigando. Con el cambio de fiscal, Garc√≠a Ortiz ya ten√≠a v√≠a libre para pedir la amnist√≠a para los CDR terroristas.
El titular del Juzgado Central de Instrucci√≥n n√∫mero 6 de la Audiencia Nacional, Manuel Garc√≠a-Castell√≥n, propuso el a√±o pasado para juicio a 12 CDR. La Sala de lo Penal aval√≥ esta decisi√≥n y el fiscal encargado del caso, Vicente Gonz√°lez Mota, pidi√≥ en noviembre del a√±o pasado que los CDR fueran procesados por terrorismo al constatar durante la investigaci√≥n que fabricaron explosivos y planeaban acciones violentas para lograr la independencia de Catalu√±a. La Sala, presidida por el juez F√©lix Alfonso Guevara, tard√≥ unos meses en se√±alar la vista de previo pronunciamiento ‚Äî√∫ltimo paso antes de abrir juicio oral‚Äî en la que los procesados pidieron ser amnistiados.
La primera vista se suspendi√≥ por una baja m√©dica y se se√±al√≥ una nueva fecha, que fue el d√≠a de ayer, 27 de junio. Para sorpresa de los intervinientes en la causa, el fiscal
Vicente Gonz√°lez Mota hab√≠a sido sustituido por la teniente fiscal de la Audiencia Nacional. Fuentes solventes aseguran que el fiscal jefe Jes√∫s Alonso mand√≥ a Marta Dur√°ntez a la vista porque es una de las fiscales de su m√°xima confianza y que iba a estar a favor de aplicar la Ley de Amnist√≠a. Dicho y hecho, la n√∫mero 2 de la Audiencia Nacional se√±al√≥ que hab√≠a que perdonar los hechos defendiendo que ¬´fueron una realidad que no lleg√≥ a producirse¬ª. Todo lo contrario a lo se√±alado por Gonz√°lez Mota siete meses antes que incardinaba las acciones de los CDR en un presunto delito de terrorismo.
Fuentes consultadas aseguran que Vicente Gonz√°lez Mota no ha asistido a las instalaciones de la Audiencia Nacional el d√≠a de esta vista clave para que el Ministerio P√∫blico se pronunciara sobre la amnist√≠a. Las se√±aladas fuentes indican que los d√≠as anteriores s√≠ pudieron ver al fiscal en su despacho y que le encontraban bajo de √°nimo al ver que se iban a amnistiar a terroristas.
Marta Dur√°ntez, por orden de su jefe Jes√∫s Alonso, ha pedido la mencionada amnist√≠a, aline√°ndose as√≠ con el criterio de la Fiscal√≠a General del Estado que defiende el borrado de los delitos. El propio √Ålvaro Garc√≠a Ortiz convoc√≥ una Junta de Fiscales para fijar este criterio en favor de la amnist√≠a. Marta Dur√°ntez le debe el puesto a Garc√≠a Ortiz que la nombr√≥ para dirigir la Audiencia Nacional como n√∫mero 2. La teniente fiscal ha aclarado que su presencia en la vista ¬´se trata de un tema organizativo interno valorado por la jefatura como lo procedente¬ª, evidenciando que Gonz√°lez Mota no quer√≠a asistir a la misma y que Jes√∫s Alonso la mand√≥ a ella.
Alegaciones ‚Äòcaso CDR‚Äô
Las acusaciones ejercidas por la Asociaci√≥n de V√≠ctimas del Terrorismo (AVT), Asociaci√≥n Dignidad y Justicia, Asociaci√≥n Espa√±ola de la Guardia civil (AEGC) Asociaci√≥n Unificada de la Guardia civil (AUGC) y al partido pol√≠tico VOX, dirigidas bajo la direcci√≥n letrada del despacho Fuster-Fabra, han presentado un escrito de alegaciones contra la posici√≥n de la Fiscal√≠a de aplicar la
Ley de Amnist√≠a. El documento al que ha tenido acceso OKDIARIO se√±ala que el texto es inconstitucional, ya que la Constituci√≥n Espa√±ola s√≥lo prev√© el indulto individualizado y, en ning√∫n caso, la amnist√≠a. Tambi√©n consideran que es contraria al Derecho Europeo.
¬´Entendemos que la Fiscal√≠a se organiza como quiere. S√≥lo echamos de menos al fiscal Vicente Gonz√°lez Mota, que ha sido quien nos ha acompa√±ado durante todo el procedimiento y que entend√≠a la sensibilidad de las asociaciones de v√≠ctimas del terrorismo y consideramos que siempre ha tenido presente, como es habitual en la Fiscal√≠a, los principios de igualdad, proporcionalidad y tutela judicial efectiva, adem√°s del principio de legalidad, y el respeto no solo en nuestra Constituci√≥n Espa√±ola, sino la aplicaci√≥n del c√≥digo penal espa√±ol¬ª, se√±ala el abogado de las acusaciones Ignacio Fuster-Fabra en una conversaci√≥n con OKDIARIO.
